![](https://www.thieme.com/images/stories/t-news/jrnls/230/tcs_230.jpg)

**英文简介：**

This journal publishes articles of the highest standard from internationally recognized thoracic and cardiovascular surgeons, cardiologists, anesthesiologists, physiologists, and pathologists. Original articles, case reports, and important meeting announcements keep you abreast of key clinical advances, as well as providing the theoretical background of cardiovascular and thoracic surgery. An essential resource for maintaining the state-of-the-art in thoracic and cardiovascular surgery.

**中文简介：（来自Google、百度翻译）**

本杂志发表国际公认的胸心血管外科医师、心脏病学家、麻醉师、生理学家和病理学家的最高标准文章。原始文章、病例报告和重要会议公告让您了解关键的临床进展，并提供心血管和胸外科的理论背景。在胸外科和心血管外科中保持最先进水平的基本资源。
